name: Cow Crusher
description: In 'Cow Crusher' you need to hit the correct button to squish the animal into the right product to keep the quality high and your score low - but watch out for horses in the works!  Don't hit the crush buttons when there is a horse in place or else you'll drop the meat quality very quickly and lose the game.  It's all cow, all the way in Cow Crusher!  This is a game by GameTheNews.net, creators of the recent and controversial Endgame: Syria.  Responding to real-world events in the form of games, we rapid prototype short playable experiences to make you smile or think!
